simulator.framework.faultmodels

Class BERFaultModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.framework.Logger
      • simulator.framework.faultmodels.BERFaultModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkFaultModel, TimeSensitive

    public class BERFaultModel
extends Logger
implements NetworkFaultModel, TimeSensitive
    Kills a message at exponentially distributed intervals with a mean of 1/inverseBitErrorRate. If no message is being sent when the bit error occurs, then the error has no effect.

      • BERFaultModel

        public BERFaultModel(long inverseBitErrorRate)
        Parameters:
        inverseBitErrorRate - - Inverse of the bit error rate. If the bit error rate is lambda (1E-3/s), then specify * 1000 (1e3)
        verbose -

    • Method Detail

      • registerNetworkScheduler

        public void registerNetworkScheduler(NetworkScheduler ns)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkFaultModel
        Give the fault model a reference to the network scheduler. This allows it to call the fault interface methods, such as isMessagePending and dropCurrentMessage.
        Specified by:
        registerNetworkScheduler in interface NetworkFaultModel
        Parameters:
        ns - The network scheduler this fault model is registered with.

        Parameters:
